(Alright, the "LAN bash" is over, three of us playing a little StarCraft, 
Grand Theft Auto, Jedi Knight, Jedi Knight: Mysteries of the Sith, and a hell 
of a lot of Quake and Delta Force.  On Monday I was up from 8AM to 8AM, so 
total lack of sleep, then I woke up at 2PM on Tuesday and we played from 2PM 
to 1AM and then I got about ten hours of sleep, so although I'm rejuivinated 
I need to check e-mail, etc, so tomorrow I will start the IGL matches)

(PS: I ruled Delta Force with an iron grip :)

-L. Unitron
